page.title: 17GAMES WE PLAY
page.content:
At school we play a lot of different games,we play{Bulldog, Tiggy, 45 and {in, cricket}and{football.}In{Bulldog someone is on and others stand behind a line and the person who is on picks a person and that person has to dodge the person who is on who is trying to catch him. If he gets into the semi_circle the others run into the semi_cicle and if someone gets caught they are on with the original catcher.
{45 AND IN {--------- 45 and in is a very fast game and can be dangerous. One person is on and stays counting at a post up to 45 and the others hide and have to run to the post and say 45 and in before they are caught.
